title: Bounties for cs
body:
Just another way for riot to indirectly buff the assassins who snowball out of control. 

So I zoned the talon off cs for a while after somehow surviving his lvl 2 100-0 under turret combo. 

He comes back down a ton of gold because he took a risky pick that didn’t pay off. Suddenly because he got his duskblade gets one kill on me and get a 600 gold bounty. 

Excuse me what? Who thought this was a good idea? I’m getting punished for winning my lane?

You still get a gold advantage from CS.

It is meant to stop people from just AFK farming top all game with no repercussions or interaction, or risk, for that matter.
